actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of June 5, 1978, (H. Doc. 95-346) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds budget authority in the amount of $48,000,000 for foreign military assistance (H. Doc. 95-346), pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of June 5, 1978, (H. Doc. 95-346) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
